```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
lap_times <- read.csv("data/formula1/lap_times.csv")
drivers <- read.csv("data/formula1/drivers.csv")
races <- read.csv("data/formula1/races.csv")
```

```{r}
semifull_df <- left_join(lap_times, drivers, by = "driverId")
full_df <- left_join(semifull_df, races, by = "raceId")
full_df <- full_df |>
  select(-c(1, 2, 6, 8, 12:14, 16, 17, 19:31))
```

```{r}
full_df |>
  group_by(name, code)
```
